definition: to bear and raise children
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
archaic variant of 汝[ru3]
female/woman/daughter

sentences.english: Babies and the chancy life of a musician do not exactly go together.
sentences.chinese: 生儿育女和乐师动荡不定的生活是不合拍的。

sentences.english: This is one of the areas where we definitely do not want them to nest.
sentences.chinese: 我们绝对不愿意它们在这里结婚，筑巢，生儿育女。

sentences.english: This is in part because those good educations make having children a pricey proposition.
sentences.chinese: 部分原因是良好的教育促使生儿育女的成本太高。

sentences.english: He does not even feel guilty for procreating with Mrs. Polar Bear.
sentences.chinese: 他也没有因为与北极熊夫人生儿育女而有愧。

sentences.english: Most young women feel a biological need to procreate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的年轻妇女都有生儿育女的生理需要。

sentences.english: Jim wasn't fundamentally mad about a home and kids.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆其实并不急于娶亲成家，生儿育女。

definition: to carry on one's ancestral line
to get married and have kids/to start a family
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
to give birth to a child or children
to take a wife/to get married (man)
to get married and start a career (idiom)/to settle down/to establish oneself
to look after one's aged parents and arrange proper burial after they die
to get married (of woman)
to remarry (of woman)
to marry/to get married/CL:次[ci4]
to stay together/to rely on one another
to settle down and get married (of a man)/to become a recognized expert
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to bring up (children)/to raise/to bear
matrimony/wedding/marriage/CL:樁|桩[zhuang1],次[ci4]
